programme.desc: Jimmy Dugan, a washed-up ballplayer whose big league days are over, is hired to coach in the All-American Girls Baseball League of 1943, while the male pros are at war.

programme.desc: A heartwarming story of three outcasts coping with the frustrations of life in New York City. Starring Jack Nicholson as a curmudgeon and Greg Kinnear as a gay artist who live in the same building with Helen Hunt, the waitress who changes their lives.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder â and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Philadelphia, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Hailed as a landmark film that dazzles with deep emotion and exceptional acting, PHILADELPHIA stars Tom Hanks and Denzel Washington as two competing lawyers who join forces to sue a prestigious law firm for AIDS discrimination. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: Boxcar Bertha, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the Depression era of the 1930s, a young woman and three men rob trains and plan a kidnapping. The men are caught and the woman becomes a prostitute. Based on "Sister of the Road" by Boxcar Bertha Thomson as told to Ben L. Reitman.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monstersâ¦ and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy's response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!

programme.title: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy's team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn't realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdomâ¦
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!

programme.title: News of the raid on the Revolutionary Army reaches Luffy! But that's the least of their worries as they face a storm and a sudden lack of provisions! Meanwhile, Emperor Kaido fumes with anger at the reckless generation of upstarts!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Returns! An Imminent Threat to the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Sneaking in to the Navy island facility to replenish their food supply, Luffy and the others risk being caught out in the open! Will their infamy make them easy to spot by the hotheaded Navy recruits around them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hungry Front! Luffy and the Navy Rookies!

programme.title: The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they've had a chance to raid the cabinets for food?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy's upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue to suffer from blazing heat and a perilous food crisis! As the seas finally calm, fishing is their only hope! Meanwhile, Sanji arrives in Big Mom's territory and keeps his cool - until he sees his bride-to-be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji's Homecoming! Into Big Mom's Territory!

programme.title: Luffy is in danger as the venomous fish poison courses through his body! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a mysterious ship for help - a ship that bears a truly surprising crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: On the edge of life and death, Luffy's only hope rests with Sanji's siblings! But even though they refuse to share an antidote, they may be able to save Luffy's life yet, giving him enough energy to plunge right back into trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Poison Crisis! Luffy and Reiju!

programme.title: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!

programme.title: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiancÃ©e of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile, an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Daughter! Sanji's fiancÃ©e - Pudding!

programme.title: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search of a specific pastry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Massive Attack! Mom's Hunger Pangs!

programme.title: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can't prepare them fast enough, her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!

programme.title: As the Straw Hats draw closer to the Whole Cake Island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory - and hatches a plan to win back Sanji and take an item of great worth from the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Castle! Arriving at the Whole Cake Island!

programme.title: Brook and Pedro head out in a submersible to infiltrate Big Mom's stronghold! Meanwhile, Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot head into the island chasing the image of Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mysterious Forest Full of Candies! Luffy vs. Luffy?!

programme.title: Lost in the bewildering woods and chasing after Sanji, Nami and the others find there's more than meets the eye in this upside down part of the Whole Cake Island! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Assassin! Luffy and the Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa's King Judge!

programme.title: Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile, Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!

programme.title: Big Mom has Caesar Clown at her whims - and despite his bilking her out of countless amounts of money - she is ready to continue her pursuit of maniacal world control!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Giant Ambition! Big Mom and Caesar!

programme.title: Finally, Nami finds Luffy and recounts her harrowing tale of battling Brulee! Meanwhile, the mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his true identity! But this must all be put aside when one of Mom's most powerful generals comes calling!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Souls! Mom's Fatal Ability!

programme.title: The identity of the enigmatic Pound, the man half-buried in the woods, is revealed, but his deep connection to Big Mom might not be enough to save him! Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping Mom's minions at bay!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Top Officer! The Sweet 3 General Cracker Appears!

programme.title: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Enemy Worth 800 million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!

programme.title: Luffy continues to fight against Cracker, whose powers to manipulate his surroundings may prove more troublesome than he had thought! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate the Whole Cake Island - and must hatch a plan to avoid getting caught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability

programme.title: The wind starts to go out of Luffy's sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and an all-star cast reunite in this action-packed adventure where an accursed mummy is resurrected â along with a force even more powerful: The Scorpion King (The Rock).
